Overview

Indian Institute of Technology Bombay is one of the premier engineering and technology institutes in India. Established in 1958, IIT Bombay has been at the forefront of engineering education and research, producing some of the finest engineers and technologists who have made significant contributions to society.

Rankings & Accreditations

NIRF #3 Engineering NAAC A++ UGC Approved AICTE Approved NBA Accredited

IIT Bombay consistently ranks among the top engineering institutions in India and is recognized globally for its academic excellence.

History & Legacy

Established in 1958 with assistance from UNESCO and the Soviet Union, IIT Bombay has grown into a center of excellence in engineering education and research.

The institute has produced notable alumni including Nobel laureates, Padma awardees, and leaders in industry and academia.

International Collaborations

IIT Bombay has active collaborations with over 100 international universities including MIT, Stanford, and Cambridge for student exchange and research programs.

The institute regularly hosts international conferences and welcomes visiting faculty from around the world.

Courses & Fees

IIT Bombay offers a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering, sciences, humanities, and management.

B.Tech Programs

  • Computer Science & Engineering
  • Electrical Engineering
  • Mechanical Engineering
  • Chemical Engineering
  • Aerospace Engineering

Duration: 4 years

Fees: ₹2.0 - 2.8 Lakhs/Year

M.Tech Programs

  • Data Science & Engineering
  • Renewable Energy Engineering
  • Robotics & Automation
  • Structural Engineering
  • Biomedical Engineering

Duration: 2 years

Fees: ₹1.5 - 2.2 Lakhs/Year

MBA Program

  • Technology Management
  • Business Analytics
  • Operations Management
  • Finance
  • Marketing

Duration: 2 years

Fees: ₹4.0 Lakhs/Year

Admissions

Admission to IIT Bombay is highly competitive and based on national-level entrance examinations. The institute follows a rigorous selection process to identify the best talent.

Undergraduate Admissions

  • Based on JEE Advanced score
  • JEE Main qualification required
  • Admission through JoSAA counseling
  • Minimum 75% in Class XII required

Application Period: April - May

Exam Date: June

Postgraduate Admissions

  • GATE score for M.Tech
  • CAT score for MBA
  • Written test and interview
  • Minimum 60% in Bachelor's degree

Application Period: January - March

Interview Date: April - May

International Admissions

  • SAT score for undergraduates
  • GRE score for postgraduates
  • English proficiency test (TOEFL/IELTS)
  • Direct application to international cell

Application Period: November - February

Seats: Limited supernumerary seats

Placements

IIT Bombay has an excellent placement record with top companies from India and abroad participating in the recruitment process. The institute boasts one of the highest average salary packages among Indian engineering colleges.

Placement Statistics

  • Placement Rate: 98%
  • Highest Package: ₹3.67 Crores/Year
  • Average Package: ₹22 Lakhs/Year
  • Median Package: ₹18 Lakhs/Year
  • Companies Participated: 300+

Top Recruiters

  • Microsoft
  • Google
  • Amazon
  • Tata Group
  • Reliance Industries
  • Goldman Sachs
  • McKinsey & Company

Sector-wise Placement

  • IT/Software: 42%
  • Analytics & Data Science: 18%
  • Core Engineering: 15%
  • Finance & Banking: 12%
  • Consulting: 8%
  • Others: 5%

Campus Gallery

Explore the beautiful 550-acre campus of IIT Bombay through these images showcasing its academic buildings, hostels, recreational facilities, and natural surroundings.

Academic Buildings

The institute has state-of-the-art academic buildings with modern classrooms, laboratories, and research facilities.

Student Hostels

IIT Bombay has 18 hostels that provide comfortable accommodation for students with all necessary amenities.

Campus Grounds

The lush green campus includes beautiful landscapes, gardens, and the famous Powai Lake surrounding the institute.

Student Reviews

Here's what current and former students have to say about their experience at IIT Bombay:

Academic Experience

4.8/5 Excellent Faculty

"The academic rigor at IIT Bombay is challenging but rewarding. The professors are world-class and the curriculum is designed to foster innovation and critical thinking."

Rahul Sharma, B.Tech CSE '21

Campus Life

4.5/5 Vibrant Community

"Campus life at IIT Bombay is amazing! With numerous clubs, festivals, and events, there's always something happening. The hostels become your second home."

Priya Patel, M.Tech '20

Placement Support

4.9/5 Top Companies

"The placement cell works tirelessly to bring the best companies to campus. The preparation sessions and mock interviews were extremely helpful in securing my dream job."

Arjun Kumar, MBA '22

Additional Information

IIT Bombay is dedicated to providing world-class education and research opportunities. The institute encourages innovation and entrepreneurship through various initiatives like the Society for Innovation and Entrepreneurship (SINE).

The campus features a vibrant student community with over 100 clubs and societies covering technical, cultural, and sports activities.

With state-of-the-art research facilities and collaborations with industry leaders, IIT Bombay provides an ecosystem that nurtures talent and transforms students into future leaders. Flagship events such as Techfest and Mood Indigo draw global participation and showcase student talent. Interdisciplinary research centers and maker spaces encourage hands-on, cross-domain problem solving. Through SINE, students receive mentorship, seed funding, and access to a thriving startup ecosystem. World-class sports, cultural, and wellness facilities support holistic growth beyond the classroom. Robust alumni networks and industry partnerships open doors to internships, international exchanges, and collaborative research.
